### Organizational Analysis of Public Safety’s Government Operations Centre

#### Contract Title: Organizational Analysis of Public Safety's Government Operations Centre

#### Reference Number: PW-23-01030122
#### Amendment Number: 2
#### Solicitation Number: 202304662
#### Publication Date: March 15, 2023
#### Closing Date: April 14, 2023

**Tender Overview**

Public Safety Canada is seeking a contractor to assess the organization structure, processes, and business delivery model of the Government Operations Centre (GOC) Program. The selected contractor will research best practices, alternative organizational structures, and delivery models from provincial, federal, and international emergency management organizations. The outcome of this project will outline options and recommendations for the efficient and effective delivery of the GOC's mandate, while also meeting the evolving needs of the future emergency management environment in Canada.

**Eligibility Criteria**

The procurement is open to Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) SA Holders who hold a TSPS SA under the series of SAs (E60ZT-18TSPS/D). Contractors may not submit a bid unless they have been invited to do so. Proponents who are not invited to submit a bid may request an invitation up to five business days prior to the closing date.

**Security Requirements**

The Contractor must possess a minimum of Designated Organizational Screening, Secret clearance. Resources employed on the project must have a minimum of Reliability, Secret clearance.

**Contract Details**

**Contract Period**: 
The contract is expected to commence upon award and run until March 31, 2024. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to extend the contract by up to one additional two-year period.

**Method of Supply**: 
The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.

**Submission Guidelines**: 
Interested bidders must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions outlined in the solicitation document.

**Contact Information**
For more information or to request an invitation to participate, please contact the Contracting Authority at contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca.

**Categories**: 
This procurement falls under the following categories:

* Organizational Design and Classification Consultant
* Business Consultant
* Financial Specialist

**Notes**: 
A copy of the solicitation document is available upon request. The Contracting Authority reserves the right to amend this solicitation at any time prior to the closing date.
